t: Fire in the Kitchen Spice Company
s: Fire in the Kitchen Spice Co. has developed some of the most outstanding dry rubs on the market today! Perfect for chicken, beef, fish, pork, soups & more.
Fire in the Kitchen Spice Co. offers specialty spice blends made from home recipes using fresh-sourced spices. MSG and Gluten-Free and made without the use of fillers or preservatives.

Half the sodium and twice the flavour of leading spice brands. ... Made in Canada since 2009. Serving up the world ever since. ... MSG, Gluten, Allergen and GMO Free! ... Perfect for the BBQ, broiling, steaming, frying and slow cooking. The most outstanding dry rubs on the market today. Chicken, pork, beef, veggies and fish never tasted so good!
